pr_title: ValueSourceType should not be NONE for some of @DimensionFormula

timeline.message: ValueSourceType should not be NONE for some of @DimensionFormula

timeline.bodyText: tableSource is not something we want to infer. It must be provided by the developer in the HJSON file.  TableSource of NONE means no type ahead search should be provided by the API.  This change basically removes that option.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: See comment below - this change can be reverted based on that comment.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I believe the UI will interpret this as an actual ID and look it up in the metadata API.  Better to just let it be null.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.message: ValueSourceType should not be NONE for some of @DimensionFormula
